评论详情: I am 5’8”, slim to medium build. I got a large in purple. The color is a lovely true lavender color. I love the sleeve length which comes to about my knuckles. The length is perfect so that you don’t lift your arms and show your stomach. It is soft and is a lighter weight, perfect for year round weather.

评论用户: I love it!!! Made well, nice material and very beautiful! Color vibrant and well represented in pics.
评论详情: I love it!! It’s beautiful and soft and well made. Not too thick but not thin at all. I can’t wait to wear it!!! It fits great!

I purchased the Blue & Sail Blue in an XL.  I'm 5'8", 195 lbs.  I love this sweatshirt!  It's more of a French terry, which I like because it's not so heavy.  It's soft & has a nice stretch.  The bottom is nice & loose and the fit is just slightly boxy.  It fits my 40D chest nicely.  The side slits are a nice touch.  I liked them so much I ordered the Spinach Green.  The reason for the title, Not the Same, is because this color is a different fabric.  While the 2 blue ones were 95% poly, 5% Spandex, the Spinach Green one is 50% cotton & 50% poly.  Totally different fabric.  It is heavier & obviously has no stretch.  So the fit feels more "snug".  Also the color is darker than what shows on Amazon.  I'm keeping it because it's an ok sweatshirt, I just don't love it like the other 2.

Got this product really quick which was great. It’s also very soft and color was pretty. That being said, it was obviously worn by someone, as it reeked of someone’s cologne which was kind of gross and it was also sized really big.

Exactly what I was looking for and couldn't be happier. Purchased in 4 colors. Machine washed (cold) and placed in dryer (medium heat). Very little shrinkage. I'm 5'4" and normally wear a size medium to large. I ordered this in medium and love the oversized fit! Nice and comfortable!

评论概述: Love the color and the fit
评论详情: This sweatshirt is exactly what I was looking for. I had tried a few others and returned them because I didn't like the fit or the color was not what I expected. I go it in taupe and the color is beautiful.  I am a bit big in the chest and I hate to buy large because then it is too big all over.  I bought a medium and it fits perfect.
Super soft,  pretty,  great quality,  perfect for anytime.  Definitely buying more from this company!

This is a nice basic oversized shirt. Sort of a sweatshirt but a little more thin. That said, I like it. It is not fuzzy. It can go with jeans or leggings. Obviously not ideal for nicer events or evenings out or work when you need something nice. But great casual shirt. I will buy more in more colors. Update: So I did buy a couple of these. One issue is that they stain SUPER easily and when I try to use stain remover to get the stains out, it discolors the shirt. It is such an issue that I can't buy anymore even though I like the fit and the material because essentially the shirt is nearly unwearable once you get one thing on it. I am not that un-messy, especially in a shirt that is not going to be a dress shirt, so I down graded it from five to four stars. I have this in red, blue, teal, gray, and yellow but I can only wear the gray because the others got stained and/or discolored from my efforts to remove said stains which don't come out of this mateiral very easily at all.

Nice weight of the "sweat" flocking inside...not too heavy.  The color I ordered (Spinach) wasn't flattering on me.  I thought it looked like a grayish green, but no, it really is the color of Spinach.  In order to have it drape over my bum, I ordered a large.  It did the trick there, but then the arms were too long and overly boxy in torso.  It will be lovely on a slimmer, taller body type.

I ordered what it said what size I should. I'm a small person it told me to order a medium, I should of ordered a small. It runs big. The material is soft and I really like the color and wasn't too bothered by the size.  I was comfy wearing it. I ordered a bright blue one too. I would recommend ordering the sweatshirt . The value of the shirt was worth it.

These sweatshirts are just the right weight for California winters. Super cozy with leggings and medium is just right (I’m 5’7”, 150 lbs) but I worry about shrinking in the wash. I have three colors.  BUT be aware that this material shows EVERY little thing! A tiny speck from lunch, or you leaned against a counter? Now you have a super obvious splotch that doesn’t fade.  Seems to come out in the wash, but I’ve been changing in the middle of the day, which I usually never do. Other than that, these shorts are awesome.

I like the weight of this shirt for workouts. The first wash was fine although I dried it in the dryer separately so it didn't get wrinkled. No, I'm not going to iron sweatshirts! I ordered three colors. The hot pink hasn't been washed yet. We will see.

I love the sweatshirt-soft, comfy, wide band bottom. I ordered pale yellow (as another reviewer stated) and got the bright golden yellow instead. Since I love the sweatshirt I'm keeping it, but seriously...ship what the customer ordered or change your photos accordingly.
I love the comfort, look and feel, but wish the bottom was looser.
This is a very nice sweater/sweatshirt. It runs a little big but perfect to wear we with thermals under it.. beautiful color and washes great

评论概述: Soft and comfy, but really is oversized!
评论详情: Love, love the sweatshirt, just wish I would have sized down.  This is such a soft shirt - I really love it, but I really did order it too big - I wanted it to fit big, but not quite this "baggy".  My fault, should have read the reviews and ordered a size smaller.
I like the color, shape and weight but the sleeves are a tad too long.
The green color was not as expected- a little to bright and Christmasy. Good and warm though.

I absolutely love these sweatshirts. I have no idea why this is a “frequently returned item”…..I have bought 5! They do come vacuum sealed when they are shipped so they are very wrinkled at first. This has not been as issue tho as they come out basically wrinkle free after washed/dryed. I also have a steamer that works on the wrinkles too. I am 5’4” 125 lbs and the small fits a little big……but that’s the way I like it. Love the length too.
I returned it due to it being too big. I needed a large not an x-large. They went up in price after I returned mine or I would have ordered another one.
This has a vibrant color but the shape is very boxy and it does not provide much warmth
I like the sweatshirt. It is roomy and comfy and covers the bootie. The color is not burgundy, however. It leans way towards dark rust. I still like it, though.

I love this sweatshirt, good fit, warm for cold winter days, not too bulky under a jacket, long enough (just right length)! I ordered peacock blue which should be an aqua color but it is as green as the grass!! I kept it bc it’s so comfy!
Size runs small
Really like this sweatshirt. Have several colors. It is really soft.  Great fabric weight.  It is a bit on the fitted side so size up if you want a more loose fit look.

I got this white sweater because I was in need of something new. After 6 years of wearing the same sweater I'm due for a upgrade. I prefer the  simple look. This did the job. It will match most anything I have. I was able to even tuck it in with a long straight skirt. Worth the closet, it didn't shrink after washing, warm, and the material was soft. I'm 5ft and 130 lb with a Mom belly. I would get again and maybe in a different color or a few.

Very good quality for the price. Very soft. Durable. I bought a large and it I could have went with a medium. But works well with leggings to cover your butt with a large.  Overall I love the comfort and size and durability. I will repurchase in other colors.

评论概述: Wish it were longer, and maybe a little looser
评论详情: The picture looks as if it’s longer. I am 5’5”, 134 pounds. I went by the bust size that was bigger than my personal measurement. I got a small. It just fits, but... It isn’t long enough to go over my “toosh” like it looks in pic. I wish the description gave a height and weight of the model to go by, and what size she was wearing. This would be more helpful. It is a pretty sweatshirt as far as I can tell, without washing and wearing a few times. I will return this.
This sweatshirt is very soft and I love the color.  It is shorter than I thought it would be from the picture, as I wanted to wear it with leggings.
This fit perfectly.  Loved the color.
This sweatshirt is comfortable,warm,beautiful  colorant good quality. I have bought 2 and I want to get more  colors!!

评论概述: How wrinkle this crew neck arrived
评论详情: The color
Oversized very comfy and not to heavy to make you sweat.
I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and style of the shirt. I'm glad that I ordered the XL. I am definitely going to order several more.

I am so glad that I finally found this sweatshirt. I hate tight bands on sweatshirts. This one has an open bottom and it’s very easy to wear. It is not really heavy, but yet it is warm.  If you’re looking for a comfortable sweatshirt, I would not hesitate to recommend it.

评论概述: Pale “A” yellow is actually mustard yellow
评论详情: A-Yellow too bright, also size Large wasn’t roomy enough for me. Will be returning for another color in XL because it is a nice quality sweatshirt.  I am 5’7” 175 lbs
Really cozy and soft material.  Bought as a gift.  She really loves it
I love this for Fall… stylish, comfortable, love the color🤗👍

The fit is true to size,the arm length is generous especially for someone who is tall (I'm 5'9) and the sleeves hit at my wrist. The issue I have is the with the sweatshirts ribbed hem it's tapered and fits tighter through the hips and there's not any stretch. I purchased other colors of the same sweatshirt and this is not an issue with those. Also about the color it was disappointing.  A pretty pastel yellow is pictured but is actually a yellow mustard color.

I have this sweatshirt in several colors.  Love the softness and it washes well.  I am disappointed in the color of this one. I thought it would be more of a butterscotch but it is more of a melon color.
I like this sweat shirt. It wasn't the peacock green I thought it was from the picture but the color is nice anyway.  The material was soft as well.

评论概述: Loved it so much I bought 2
评论详情: Perfect oversize sweatshirt that is comfy and cute! Arm length is perfect and it is a boxier fit which I love since I have broad shoulders.

Positives:  Soft & comfortable.  The mint green is nice and quality seems fine.  Didn't shrink with washing.Negatives:  Baggy & not as stylish as it seemed.  I normally wear  medium in shirts, and that's the size I bought.  It's quite baggy in all respects, including having dropped shoulders, causing bagginess in the armpits. I don't think it's because of the size I bought; it's just the way it's styled.  Comes across as very casual and not at all stylish.
I love this sweatshirt. It is soft and fits perfectly. I bought the yellow one and do enjoy it.
Shirt is comfy. The yellow is much lighter than the one shown.
Very comfortable washes up nicely
Looks more like a basic sweatshirt than tunic. Material is soft.
I didn't get the yellow because the saturation in the image has clearly been messed with. The burgundy is true to color and is a nice light shirt. It's a lose fit but I like it that way.
Love the fit and feel

So Soft and thick and bright... I love the yellow.  Was a little bigger than I thought it would be but its still a great sweat shirt. I ordered a L will reorder again and get a M. Great with leggings or jeans.

The picture of yellow is a muted kind of banana color which I wanted. This one is bright gold yellow. I’m thinking about bleaching it, or dying it black 🤷🏽‍♀️ I like the oversized fit of it so I don’t want to return it. It’s the perfect weight and relaxed fit, but the color isnt my favorite.
Love to wear it as it's comfortable on and get compliments.
Love it fits well warm and great color
Nice color.  Soft
I got a large and probably should have gotten a medium. Super soft and love the color.
My granddaughter uses only this brand because it is very soft and comfortable. She highly recommends it
I bought a small and it still runs a little big
Love the color, fit and so comfy. Loved it so much I ordered 3 others in different colors and all are great. Highly recommended.
True to size! Love it.

This sweatshirt is thinner than expected, but it’s absolutely perfect. Great length, good fit. Runs true or slightly big. And it’s one of those materials that somehow never looks dirty or worn. Very happy with this purchase.

The fit, comfort and color are very good but I would have probably not have purchased it if I knew it was not recommended to be put in the dryer. I will see how long I remember to take it out of the washer and hang it up?!?
While I love the fit, style and overall quality of the sweatshirt, it is far from the mustard color I chose. This is a butter yellow… very light yellow.
The color, fit and material were all really great!!
Sweatshirt arrived well packaged. It is comfortable & live the color on me. Happy with my order. 👍💗
Looks good, but it was heavier than I expected.
Cozy, soft, and pretty color of green. Very tight at the bottom,  though.

评论概述: The picture does not depict the actual color.
评论详情: I have the sweatshirt in other colors and I like the quality of the shirt, but the picture does not depict the actual color of the yellow. It is a school bus yellow instead of the soft yellow in the picture. Very disappointed.
Nice and comfortable material.
Gorgeous’s color, true to size, I bought several more just like it! The fit is loose and comfy!
Good quality, however, colors totally off!  If you want KELLY green order the Blue!

评论详情: Love the look and feel of the sweater. The first one arrived and there were ink marks on the front top where some top stitching was. I returned on 12/30 and received the second one 12/31. Opened it and, to my surprise, blue ink dots in the same place. I am in the process of returning it now. Gee, I’m so disappointed.

评论概述: Have it in another color to
评论详情: Love this, comfortable, sizing is great, quality is great, washed and dryed and no shrinking.
Nice color, and feels great. Washes and dries great with no wrinkles. For me size runs small so I would suggest sizing up.
I love the material!!  It is so comfortable and the fit is great!  Going to order a couple in other colors!!
Loved the lightweight feature! Will be buying more. Great price.
Sleeves were too long
The minute I took this out of the package I knew it was going to be a favorite. It has that soft worn feel and the green color was perfect.
Great fit and good material that washes well.  Ordered in several colors-the button detail on the sleeve is great and dresses it up perfectly!
Size a little snug
As described by seller. Color is gorgeous though there are a variety .
Washes and drys beautifully. Fits perfectly. I bought a large fits hreat also bought extra large and its neck is to large but i kept it.
They ran small so I went up one size.  Perfect
I ordered the dark brown sweatshirt. The fit is good so I’m keeping it but I’d is maroon. Not even close to brown which is disappointing because I bought it for a specific outfit.

I have to say I really love this sweatshirt, after washing it, it has that nice comfy feel, I like mine bigger so I ordered up a size, and when I say I love them, I mean it so far I have about 9 of them in various colors.

I hate when an item does not look anything like the picture shown. The color and quantity is there but the fit is literally like a square. I think some of the picks shown on customers look right but obviously they were not all cut the same. I will probably return for something else.
Love the color, feel, and thickness of this.
I like everything about this sweat shirt. Its super comfortable and doesn't fit to tight or ride up on my neck. I want one in every color ASAP.
Warm cute and comfy True to size
Color is very vibrant and expensive looking. Runs true to size but I sized up to wear with leggings. Material is thinner than a typical sweatshirt.
Very comfortable. Fits true to size. Perfect to wear with leggings as length is a little longer. Lightweight but still warm.
These run extremely large. I ordered blue and green. The blue is sooo soft but the green is a different material and not soft.
I have this in a few colors, super comfy and I love the colors.  Fits like you would expect
I bought two of these Pink t-shirts one large and one extra large and they are so out of shape whoever wears them they make me look fat and dumpy I would not recommend these to anyone.

评论概述: The color received is nowhere near the color in the picture!!
评论详情: I purchased this sweatshirt in a green color and totally loved the feel and overall loose fit.  It also washes really well without "pilling".  I decided to purchase the light yellow one, but what arrived was a bright/mustard yellow one.  I had read that in another review but decided to try it anyways.  That's why I am giving this purchase 3 stars.
This sweatshirt is lightweight and hangs nicely. Runs LARGE and the color is hot pink and not "rose" There are better quality sweatshirts on Amazon, so I would not buy from this seller again.
Excellent quality - fit true to size.  Would order again!

This is the second of these shirts I have purchased, they are super comfortable and you can dress them up or make them look super casual with leggings. I first purchased a medium, which I think was OK and then I bought the gray in the small and that also fits great.
This is a great sweatshirt
Soft and comfortable. Great value. Would purchase other colors
Soft material, great color, but  I like a set in sleeve for a nicer fit.
